title: Dak Prescott, Zion Williamson, Lakers, & Jimmy G
itunes:title: Dak Prescott, Zion Williamson, Lakers, & Jimmy G
description:
Colin discusses Dak Prescott's contract situation with the Cowboys, when you should open the bank for your QB, Zion Williamson's play so far this year, why the Lakers shouldn't trade Kyle Kuzma, and why he feels people are crazy for even thinking about trading Niners QB Jimmy Garoppolo. Guests include Nick Wright, Greg Cosell, Ric Bucher, and Eric Dickerson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
